alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 1:25PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Norfolk, southern Worcester, southeastern Hampshire, southwestern Middlesex and east central Hampden Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 125 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brookfield, or 18 miles west of Worcester, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Woonsocket, Shrewsbury, Milford, Westborough, Grafton, Webster, Southbridge, Ashland, Bellingham, Auburn, Burrillville, Northbridge, Hopkinton, Oxford, Holliston, Uxbridge, Millbury, Charlton and Palmer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester
